id.description: An identifier for the data source

gamepadIndex.description: Index into the Gamepad.buttons or Gamepad.axes arrays

touchSupportedAtMinValue.description: Indicates the ability to report GamepadButton.touched==true even when the button's value is at the minimum

pressUnsupported.description: Indicates the inability to report GamepadButton.pressed

analogValues.description: Indicates the ability to report values in between min and max
